column4: Hello everyone, do you guys know an alternative to avant, the desktop app launcher?
I use gdesklet starterbar
thank you :)
I like this a lot, thanks a bunch
gdesklets has lots of good apps - use the websites ones tho
im having a problem from getting it to startup upon logging in to Gnome
in the menu open system - preferences - session - then the startup tab - then click new - and type gdesklets
ah very nice
do you have any screenshots you could link me of your desktop? :)
sure - one min
awesome :)
have you forgotten about my screenshot? No biggie if you are busy
waiting for the ubuntu gallery to accept it :)
coolness, thanks :)
http://ubuntuforums.org/g/index.php?n=2341
clock, goodweather, 2x email, net, cpu and starterbar
very neat and clean desktop
I like usability
thanks for the help, suggestions, and screenshot :)
im going to play around with gdesklets a lil, take care
enjoy!
